scripts.build: node ../../../bin/cli.js  -i ./src/reducers/drag-and-drop.scxml --compile json -o dist/drag-and-drop.json && node ../../../bin/cli.js  -i ./src/reducers/drag-and-drop.scxml --compile module -o dist/drag-and-drop.js && (cd src; browserify -d -t babelify index.js -o ../dist/index.js)
scripts.watch: cd dist; watchify -d -t babelify ../src/index.js -o 'cat > index.js; sorcery -i index.js' -v
